Class AbstractCustomItem

java.lang.Object
net.mathias2246.buildmc.api.item.AbstractCustomItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.Keyed
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractTool
public abstract class AbstractCustomItem extends Object implements org.bukkit.Keyed
An abstract-class that can be used to define custom-item types for your plugin. Custom items are defined by some data that is stored inside the ItemStack PDC. This doesn't actually define a new item type.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final @NotNull org.bukkit.NamespacedKey
    CUSTOM_ITEM_PDC_KEY
    The NamespacedKey used to store the id of the custom item inside the ItemStack PDC
